remarks: Hilbert space vector addition is associative.  (Contributed by NM, 7-Sep-2007.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
hladdf.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
hladdf.2 $e |- G = ( +v ` U ) $.
hlass $p |- ( ( U e. CHilOLD /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( ( A G B ) G C ) = ( A G ( B G C ) ) ) $.
